113.content:
You grin as you feel your cool, new power coursing through your body and you’re eager to test it on somebody. Right away, you grab your iPhone out of your pocket, and you glance at your contact list. You text a few buddies and you see who is the first to reply to your text message.

Your pal Allen is the first to reply, telling you he’s home right now, just playing a game on his laptop. Allen lives just two houses down the street, so you tell him you’ll be right over. You walk down the street and you knock on the front door of his house. His mother lets you in and you stroll over to his bedroom, closing the door behind you as you walk in.

“Hey, scripty!” he smiles at you as you walk in. He’s sitting on the chair at his desk as you walk in and take a seat at the edge of his bed.

“Dude! The coolest thing just happened to me!” you begin to tell him.

“Really? What happened?”

“On my way from school, I found a box on the ground! I picked it up and opened it, and it gave me the power to alter reality! How cool is that, huh?” I say excitedly.

Allen gives you a skeptical glance.

“Are you sure? Come on, dude! You’re pulling my leg! Alter reality? Nobody can just alter reality! That’s just impossible!” Allen laughed out loud.

“Okay. Alright!” I replied loudly. “Let’s put it to the test! What part of your body would you like me to change?” you ask your buddy. “Just tell me and I’ll change you, right here, right now!”

Allen gives you a surprised look as he accepts your challenge. He slowly stands up, grinning as he replies…

She stepped down to you, and looked over you, and smirked, giving you a mind piercing glare.
"Didn't I teach you not to pick up random things up of the floor."
You jump back, remembering the box from earlier, "What!?"
"You found a box, and a strange figure told you that you could now change reality," she said nailing it.
"How did you know?" You ask, starting to turn red.
"I picked one up too, several months back," she confessed, "I've undone any changes I made, but people with this power are immune to it's effects, they can identity the change, and agree or disagree to go along with it. You change made it so people with this power were completely self-sufficient, not needing to be wound up, like Julie, run on battery power, like Jeremy, eat ridiculous amounts, Like Bethany, sleep most of the day, Like Lucy, or any other method that will come to light. I went a long with it."

"How did you know about that?"

"What do you mean 'self-sufficient'?" you asked, trying to get more information on the change.

"Could you eat?" You ask.
"Yes I could, but I won't be able to make energy from it, and unlike someone like Beth who recharged with food, I would be very susceptible to it, and I would gain weight easily, eating just a slice of cake could put weight on me."

"Huh? Hurt you?" You laughed. "You're way bigger than me."

The bully looked like he understood that, but he still felt overly shy and scared of you, regardless.

"Get outta here!" you yell at him, causing him to scurry off, nearly tripping over his own feet to get away. This was amazing! You really did have power to change things!

So what now?
13212.title: The Bully Becomes Overly Shy

everytime he wets he will act more like a infant
13223.content:
You decide that you would change the bully's clothing. You make the bully's clothing change into what a infant would be wearing. You think why not embarrass him even more. You switch it to female clothing. His underwear had changed into a pink diaper, his pants had changed to tights, his t-shirt had lengthened becoming a dress, finally his tennis shoes had become a pair of maryjanes. The reason why the bully was picking on you is to impress his girlfriend. So you decided to punish her also. You had also changed it so that his teeth had vanished and that he has forgotten his potty-training.

You then decide to change her reality so she thinks that her boyfriend is now her baby daughter. You had also change her age from 15 to 21. You also had given her some stretch marks and that her breast had started to lactate, her clothing also changed to the type designed for breastfeeding.

You then decided to
13223.title: something else

choices: Continue on to erase the world at your Liesure.
Your Heart splits. You are now at war with yourself for the fate of all.
Karma is coming to collect your debt. ^_^
1323.content:
"Awake...my...soul!"

Your hair turned to a burning Crimson, and your eyes became a blazing Azure as your body over flowed with power.


In a flash the bullies arm was completely severed with a swipe of your hand. Before he could react you grabbed the limb and started beating him with it as if it's were a club until he was a sobbing mess on the ground. You then willed the arm to burn and it was so.

You put your foot on his neck and flowed power into him to make him feel pain. The bully began to scream before exploding and evaporating into red dust.

Everything you were up to this point became irrelevant. Power was all you were now.

Your eyes burned with rage. You opened them and roared skyward as you unleashed your power onto the earth. Your whole continent consumed in a massive nuclear force.


You remained in the epicenter. All that remained was scorched Earth.

Your tears flowed endlessly from your eyes.

"I hate this world. There's nothing for me here. Not hate, not Love. Just everyone forcing their perceptions on me. Perception is reality huh?"

You grin maniacally. " Then I "perceive" you all ERASED!"
1323.title: The A.C.E awakens.

133.content: Will it be a friend
133.title: Someone else

choices: I was shrinking but becoming more muscular
I was suffering the same changes as Sonya
1331.content:
"Guess who?" I was greeted by my girlfriend, Sonya, who put her slightly big hands on my eyes.
She is dark skinned but not very appealing: she had petite feet, a slender body and A cups, plus she was only 5 feet and 2 inches tall. Despite her unattractive body, she had a hearth of gold, a ponytail that reached the end of her back and childish manners that make her both cute and interesting.
"Ummm Chloe?" I said, failing on purpose and smirking. She uncovered my eyes and gave me a mean look, putting her hands on her average hips.
"Who is Chloe?" she said. She was wearing green flats that matched her eyes, blue jeans and a violet top.
I patted her head, "i knew it was you all the time, but i love when your look when angry" I told her the truth, but what I loved more of her was what she did after. She stuck her tongue out, making me to pat her head even more until she started smiling. Then she noticed the mistery box next to me.
"Awww you brought me a present?" She said and opened it without hessitation. A glowing light impacted us both.
I saw what happened to her. Her feet and boobs increased their dimensions several times, breaking her clothes into pieces and leaving her topless and barefoot. Her current feet doubled the size of mine and were very sexy, her breast turned from a childish cup A to a huge cup LL. As her top broke, I saw her rubber underpants picking out from her jeans.
But I failed to notice what was happening to me...
1331.title: Your girlfriend

"It would be great if I had a harem where every girl loved me." You said aloud.

just them the hottest girl in school walked by.

Your realized that every girl in a harem should get along .
Then they just clung to either arm.
You was a point where you turn one way while the girls go the over.

141.title: Make a harem

142.content: "I can do anything," You say, "I could become a superhero like I always wanted, but what will my power, costume and name?"
142.title: Become a superhero

choices: You decide on a dark and mysterious costume
You decide on a light and traditional costume
You don't need a costume, you're invisible!
1421.content:
“Gosh, I always wanted to be a superhero!” you say. “Hmm… I need to get home, in my room! Right now!”

Instantly, you disappear from the spot where you were standing, which was on the sidewalk, and you pop up standing in the middle of your bedroom!

“Whoa!” you exclaim, as you look around and recognize your bedroom. “I teleported!”

You take off your tennis shoes and jeans, and you toss your t-shirt aside on your bed. Then, you walk over to the closet and open it, revealing the full-size mirror.

“Alright! Let’s see… First, I gotta have the superhero look! Hmm… I should gain some muscle, right? Like… thirty pounds of muscle?” you wonder out loud.

You feel a tingling sensation spread all over your body, specifically through every muscle! You close your eyes and groan as you feel your physical strength increase dramatically! Then, after you open your eyes and stare at your reflection in the mirror, your jaw almost drops to the floor!

“Wow!”

Your chest is bulging with awesome pectorals, which are thick and wide, on your widened shoulders. Your arms now show off those big, bowling-ball biceps! Your flat stomach now flanks washboard abdominal muscles which are totally ripped, like tiles on a kitchen floor! Your legs are thick and muscular as well, since your quads are thick as sewer pipes containing layers of muscle above the knees and your calves are practically as thick as soccer balls, sticking out from the back of your legs.

“Sweetness!” you cheer, raising up your right arm and watching a big, rock-hard ball of muscle pop up on your arm in its full glory. “I feel strong… super-strong! I must have super-strength!”

Your entire body glows as your physical strength in incremented dramatically, until it far exceeds the strength of any ordinary mortal! You have just granted yourself superhuman strength!

“Now… I need a cool-looking costume!” you say with a grin…
1421.title: You decide to muscle up and become a superhero!

choices: You fly to your best friend's house as Super Stardust
You fly off to a school party as Super Stardust
14212.content:
As you examine your new, improved, muscular frame before the large full-body mirror, you begin to ponder what kind of superhero you wish to become. Then, you visualize that since you’re only 15 years old; you want to be recognized by your classmates and your friends. You want to have fun too, and be available all the time and just live the rest of your life as Super Stardust, the superhero!

“Okay, I guess I’ll go with the classic superhero look…” you ponder.

Next, you think of a simple color combination which is bright and easily recognized.

“Hmm… I like white… Should I pick red and white or blue and white?” you wonder out loud, before settling with red.

Instantly, White spandex pants form from your waist to your ankles, covering your muscular legs all the way. At the same time, a thick, spandex-type of white shirt with long sleeves covers your torso and arms. Finally, you use your powers to finish your costume with red boots which come up to your knees, red gloves, red briefs which cover your groin, and – last but not least – an awesome, long, red cape, which is draped from your shoulders and hangs to your ankles behind your back.

“Yes! YES!” you cheer out loud. “YASSS! I look so cool! I got super strength and… I can fly!”

You then open the large bedroom window and you just leap out your window like a bird… With your arms extended in front of you and your long, red cape billowing in the wind… and you make your first flight as Super Stardust, soaring across the sky over the city, as a white-and-red muscular teen with amazing super powers!

Where do you go first, now that you’re a superhero?
14212.title: You decide on a light and traditional costume

choices: A motorcycle gang shows up at the party
A fire breaks out at the party
142122.content:
You cheer loudly as you soar across the sky, enjoying your first moments of unlimited, unbounded freedom! With your arms extended and your feet stretched out as your ankles touch one another while your long, red cape billows in the wind behind you, you soar across the sky like a fighter jet. You can’t believe that you can actually fly, as you enjoy the cold wind blowing in your face.

You smile as you fly over familiar territory, including your school, the football field, and the baseball field behind the school. Then, you noticed a lot of people walking around the entrance to the gym when it dawns on you…. Wasn’t there supposed to be a party at school tonight?

You’re all dressed up in your superhero costume! But, it’s too late to fly home and change. Some of your classmates have already spotted you and they started pointing at you from the ground. So, you may as well land near the entrance to the gymnasium and go to the party as Super Stardust!

You slow down and circle around the gym, before you just hover over one spot. Then, with your legs pointing down, you slowly descend until they touch down on the ground with your cape blowing in the wind. People immediately recognize you as Stardust, but now that you’re wearing your superhero costume, they automatically call you Super Stardust.

As soon as your red boots touch down, one of your best friends walk up to you. It’s Jason, one of your classmates, and he walks up to you with a smile on his face.

“Wow, Stardust, I knew you would come, but I didn’t expect you to show up like THIS!” he says.

“Hey! I was out on patrol when I just remembered that this party was going on tonight!” you grin.

“Great! The refreshments are inside!” Jason said, as he pointed to the doors of the gym.

You walk up to the doors and open them, walking into the noisy gymnasium. People are wandering around as loud music is blaring from the speakers. You walk towards the table where the juice is when someone taps your shoulder.

“Hey, dweeb! What the hell are you doing here wearing this clown suit?”

You look over and recognize Chuck, the big, class bully. He’s the biggest and meanest kid in your class.

“This isn’t a clown suit…” you reply calmly. “This is my superhero costume!”

“Yeah, yeah… Superhero, my butt!” Chuck sneers. “You’re no superhero!”

You try to ignore him but he’s just too annoying. Then Jason walks up to you, but Chuck starts to bug him as well.

“Hey, Jay… Look at Stardusty… He dressed up for Halloween! What a dork! So, where’s your clown suit, huh?”

You had finally had it with Chuck. You roll your eyes, you turn to face Chuck and you extend your muscular arm, grabbing him by the shirt collar.

“Okay, you moron…” you growl at him, as you easily lift his entire body off the floor, leaving his feet dangling three inches above the ground. “Leave us alone and quit bullying my friends… Got it?”
Suddenly, it got REALLY QUIET in the gym as everybody stares at you while you practically lifted a 200-pound kid off the floor with ONE HAND like he weighed NOTHING!

A whole MINUTE goes by before you set him down on the ground… People are staring at you in complete disbelief and shock… Everybody wonders how you got so strong?

“C’mon, dude… I’m thirsty!” you say to Jason. The two of you walk over to the table where the drinks are. You both pour two glasses of fruit punch while people were overheard whispering comments about you.

“Whoa! Did you see THAT? That Stardust dude is STRONG!”

“Amazing! Check out that Super Stardust dude!”

“Did you see what Super Stardust did to Chuck? Serves him right!”

You and Jason just smile as you walk around the gym, with everybody staring at you. You’re already the big hero at the party….
142122.title: You fly off to a school party as Super Stardust

choices: Mauricio Di Mauro from WunschPunsch the animated TV show.
Pork Chop from Nickelodeon's Doug animated TV show.
144.content: "So i can be any cartoon character i want eh? OK and on top of that i have a couple shall i say favorite cartoon animal corpulent characters i can pick from and now my favorite corpulent cartoon animal is...." you say to yourself
144.title: Become your favorite tv show character

info.brief_description: One day you find a box that gives you the power to change anything.
info.description:
You are 15 years old Boy (Gender may be changed in the story) attending school you are walking home on the first day of the summer vacation when you see a box. You open it and you are given the power to alter the world how ever you want.

Rules
When writing a chapter use your handle as the character's name.
In his family there must be at least The father, mother and sister. other family members may be introduced (Step family may be included and may be used as the family start)
the character may have a Girlfriend (OR boyfriend if the gender changes or not) and a best friend is needed.
Other characters must be introduced.
No ending the story
The story may be written in first or third person.
No one line option and keep all paths open if you can't think of something say reader's choice or something else or something like that.
Chapters may be reused.
Focus on this don't go to another reality with out the main character.
